definition: spiral pattern/whorl of fingerprint/thread of screw

sentences.english: Weights shown for ball valve figures are PVC threaded models.
sentences.chinese: 表中所显示的重量适用于PVC螺纹连接的球阀。

sentences.english: Gibs are to have jacking threads in two holes per gib.
sentences.chinese: 每根镶条的两个定位孔应加工插接螺纹。

sentences.english: According to the length of a locking screw's thread .
sentences.chinese: 深度对应锁钉的螺纹长度。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a tool for measuring internal thread depth of mechanical parts.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及机械零件的内螺纹深度测量工具。

sentences.english: Threaded holes and studs shall be in good condition and not damaged or worn in any way.
sentences.chinese: 有螺纹的孔和螺栓应完好，并无任何毁坏或磨损。

sentences.english: Available with threaded end connections only.
sentences.chinese: 仅限于螺纹连接端口连接件。

sentences.english: The price of thread steel has been increasing recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期螺纹钢的价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: Sturdy full-length threaded corrosion-resistant bolts provide the required high packing stress.
sentences.chinese: 坚固的全螺纹防腐螺栓提供所需要的保压应力。

sentences.english: Side view of wing screw with adjustable thread length.
sentences.chinese: 螺纹长度可调整的翼形螺钉的侧面图。

sentences.english: Both flexible whorl cover and stern with screw are placed in flexible sealing shell.
sentences.chinese: 柔性螺纹套和带有螺杆的阀杆均置于柔性密闭壳体中。

sentences.english: Twin-needle reinforced stitching with a high tensile strength thread.
sentences.chinese: 双针具有很高的拉伸强度螺纹钢筋拼接。

sentences.english: Up period beginning today rebar and wire rod futures simulated trading.
sentences.chinese: 上期所于今日开始螺纹钢和线材期货模拟交易。

sentences.english: Composite oil shocks with dual O-rings seals and threaded spring pre-load adjusters .
sentences.chinese: 综合石油冲击与双O型环密封和螺纹春季预加载调节。

sentences.english: Unscrew threaded joint securing transmission cross member to body.
sentences.chinese: 拧下将变速器横梁固定到车身的螺纹接头。

sentences.english: For example, high strength reinforced bar, stainless steel medium plate, auto.
sentences.chinese: 高拉力螺纹钢筋，不锈钢中板，汽车。

sentences.english: Rod end housing with right or left-hand female thread.
sentences.chinese: 杆端座体带有左旋或右旋的内螺纹。
